column1: #Text=Now do n't get mad , Korra 's fine .
#Text=I 'm just waiting to hear if she 'd tracked down Aiwei yet .
#Text=I thought we were on the same page about this , and then you go and stab me in the back ?
#Text=" Suyin says : " Oh , do n't be so overdramatic .
#Text=You ca n't control the Avatar 's every move .
